While you could feel the motion, the first clue you were given as to your fate was a sudden spike in heat and smell as the foot began to slid into the shoe, those few spots of light able to reach your eyes fading away as the darkness of the sneaker swallowed everything. Just moments before your back met the insole you realised what was happening, and tried to let out a silent scream before all the air was brutally crushed from your lungs.

Pulling her sneaker all the way on, Jenny quickly tied the laces and rose to her feet, her colossal weight pressing down upon you and forcing you deep into the moist insole of the shoe. For you it was like sinking into quicksand, a warm swamp of sweat and sodden fabric rising up around you and conforming to your shape even as it formed a horrid seal with the filthy sock above. If you felt the smell from before had been terrible, then this was beyond description, a thick miasma of Jenny’s foot stench rising up to surround you on all sides and only becoming worse the further you sank.

All of your torment translated into nothing more than a minor irritation to the massive blonde, a feeling that there was something weird with her left shoe, but not enough to warrant investigation. Instead she just stomped down a couple of times to remove the irritation, and sighed in relief as the barrage pushed you deep enough that you ceased to cause her any discomfort, heedless to the agony those same actions brought to you as you felt as if your bones were going to break. You couldn’t even cry out as filthy sock fuzz was forced down into your mouth, the sneaker happily claiming you as a bit of extra padding to serve the goddess-like body of the woman above.

Satisfied with her work, Jenny headed out the door with Rachel, all thoughts of your presence having completely fled her mind as the two made their way towards the park and each step pounded you further beneath her warm sweaty feet. It was part of the girl’s usual routine to go for a jog together every week, and although earlier in the day she had been thinking of calling it off this week to spend some time with her husband, right now Jenny just felt the urge to move her body. The marriage had seen her reduced to a bundle of nerves, and it was time for her to take some time to de-stress.

While you suffered the girls reached the park and almost immediately picked up speed, slamming you into the ground over and over again as Rachel set a blistering pace. The athletic girl always liked to choose a speed that would challenge her smaller friend, keen to get her in shape as quickly as possible. For you this meant an increasingly rapid barrage of stomps raining down upon you and giving you no semblance of relief as you were pounded into oblivion. Even with the moist insole beneath you, you felt like you were going to break under the assault, your muscles straining and bones creaking as the mighty sole above fell over and over again. It was hard to believe that just hours ago you’d been given to this girl, your friend, in marriage, and now you were struggling to breath beneath her merciless foot and choking down gallons of her filth and foot sweat.

You’d known Jenny for years, and you were constantly amazed at her ability to overlook your presence. Whether it was serving as some padding for her seat during maths class, filling out her bra for the school dance, or just getting kicked around beneath her feet, she seemed to have a blind-spot the size of a barn when it came to your safety. You knew that she was a kind girl and that she cared, but it was hard to keep believing that when she was squeezing the life out of you.

As if hearing your thoughts and taking offence to the same, the foot above you shifting slightly and allowed you to the slide a little to the front, just enough that when it came down again your head was caught beneath the toes, instantly gripped by the socked digits as if finding a new toy. While the tortuous foot above continued to rise and fall upon your vulnerable body, the playful toes started to rhythmically scrunch around your head in time with each footfall. In no time at all you found your face pressed firmly into the gap between Jenny’s big and second toes, a tsunami of sweat soaking through the sock to pour into your every orifice, while sock lint and grime was smeared across. What few frantic breaths you could manage between the crushing squeezes were filled with the stench of the toes, and you had to force yourself not to cough them out immediately for fear of suffocating.

For Jenny it just felt like she had a small pebble in her shoe, or maybe that a bit of the insole had come loose to make a plaything for her toes. In either case, it didn’t bother her and she continued to play with your head for the next half hour as she and Rachel ran laps around the park, your poor body being battered over and over again as the two girls maintained a steady pace along the path. She could feel the heavy sweat pooling in her shoes but thought little of it, content to squelch around for a bit longer in order to really burn off any excess calories. She had a husband now after all, and she needed to look her best if she was going to keep him happy.

By the time the two women finally stopped for a rest, Jenny happily collapsed on the nearest park bench, breathing heavily and deeply while her more athletic friend looked down at her with a smirk. The blonde’s entire body was soaked in sweat and ached from the exertion, but nowhere hurt quite so badly as her sore and tired feet. They’d overheated in the shoes and needed a chance to breathe immediately, though she did note with some confusion that the left one felt a little less sore. Of course, as she reached to remove her sneakers, she had no idea of the sweaty, exhausted and mentally broken body of her husband that lay within their depths, hoping for rescue.

Rachel on the other hand still had no idea you even existed as anything other than a doll for the relief of her aching feet. A part of her was worried that she might break it if she pushed too hard, but she reminded herself that Jenny had used this thing for hours without any permanent damage, so there was no reason to hold back.

Though puberty had given the brunette wide hips and a generous chest, she worked hard at the gym to keep herself in as good a shape as possible, with the side effect of leaving her feet perpetually sore and sweaty. For now at least your durability was keeping you safe from any permanent harm, but you could still feel the intense pain as your already thoroughly trampled body was subjected to a fresh wave of torment. Even just laying beneath her soles it was providing her with a degree of comfort that she sorely needed, and the memories of how it felt when she was actively playing with it kept running through her mind. Thinking quickly, the brunette grabbed her right boot from where it sat beside the couch and quickly clamped down on to the doll with the toes of her right foot, lifting it from the ground and dropping it into the waiting shoe. Just in time she returned the boot to its companion and put on an innocent smile as Jenny returned with her jacket. She felt bad about stealing from her friend like this, but more than that, she was exhilarated that she had succeeded in claiming her prize.

You, meanwhile, were anything but happy as you found yourself violently grabbed by Rachel’s toes and hurled into a dark dank cavern that reeked of her feet. Billy sees the couple suddenly stopping and eagerly running over to the dollhouse bedroom window. Billy is in shock as he watches them opening up their window and peeking outside. Billy’s huge eyes are a few inches away from the tiny nude couple that is clearly excited by the giant peeping toms presence. Billy places his huge hand in front of the open window, and to his amazement, they tiny couple willingly walk over to his hand, than get on it. As they sit in the palm of his, Billy watches them as they continue to make love. Damn, a willing couple,” Billy thought.

With his free hand, Billy grabs an empty glass jar and gently places them inside the jar for safekeeping. The jar has holes in it so the specimens can breathe, as he secures the jar. The tiny horny continue to make love inside the jar, as Billy places the glass jar inside his book bag. There are also some other glass jars inside his book bag, some have tiny single humans in them, while others have tiny human couples, even tiny families inside of these glass prisons. Billy is a skilled hunter of tiny people. Billy stands up, leaves twenty dollars in the dollhouse and leaves.

A few minutes later, Billy is finally makes it home. He enters his bedroom, and closes his bedroom door. Billy’s bedroom is large and has many things in it. Billy has a large collection of Marvel, DC, Star Wars, and other action figures along with their settings. He also has a small collection of exotic animals and carnivorous plants in his bedroom. Even some terrariums, which contain no predators or carnivores plants inside of them, and the terrariums to a certain extent resemble the Garden of Eden, complete with waterfalls. Billy also has two large hamster cages on the shelves and each contains some tiny humans clothed in doll clothes. One of them contains his tiny sister Hanna. Hanna is a pretty girl that has long blonde-haired and she is wearing doll clothes too. Hanna recently shrunk a year ago, unlike most other tiny humans, so her parents gave her to Billy to keep. Billy grabs three or more hamster cages and gets them ready for their new tiny captives. Next, Jason decides too?

132.content: I figure it would be good to leave options open in case anyone has other ideas.
132.title: Woman Marries Woman

1321.content:
Marissa's eyes were bloodshot as she tapped away at the keyboard. There was only a few minutes left until her deadline and she only needed a few more lines of code to finish. It wasn't easy getting a computer scaled down to someone only three inches tall, but she built it herself. She needed it to complete all her odd jobs.

While she might have a tiny head, she had an incredibly vast mind. She graduated from college the year before while others her age were still attending high school. Being born small made many things a challenge, and thus created a huge strain on her family. While her mother assured her that it was no big deal, feelings of guilt were always in the back of her head.

To help make up for it, she became the major breadwinner of the household. Using her genius, she worked as a freelance coder to whatever company needed a project done. She did amazing work and did as much work as an entire team, for only the price of half. While most of her time was taken up by work, she also left time for her other job of drawing manga. It was more of a hobby, but it also gave her the financial boost to buy her family the newly remodeled kitchen.

Hitting send, Marissa finished with a sigh. Looking at the clock on the corner of the screen showed that it had just clicked to midnight.

"Another narrow save...and happy birthday to me..." Marissa said before slumping back in her chair. After only a few seconds, she passes out with the screen illuminating her face.


A bright light woke Marissa rather abruptly. Snapping her head around her room, she spotted her mother, Karen, had just entered and switched on the lights.

"Happy Birthday, sweetie! Oh my, did you fall asleep in your chair again?" she asked, concerned. Marissa grumbled under her breath as she got up, walking towards her toy house. While she got her own room, the only normal furnishings were a table that held a toy house and her work desk. Stepping inside the front door, she flicked on its own lights. The entire place was battery powered, including the coffee machine that whirred to life.

"Sweetie? Once your done getting ready, how about you meet all of us down in the living room? We have a surprise for you..." she asked.

After taking a sip of the bitter brew, she finally spoke up into her loudspeaker. "Sure thing mom, I'll be down in a minute."

"Thank you, Marissa!"

Hearing the door open and close, Marissa downed her coffee and got ready for the day. Even though it was only the morning, she was already worn out and ready for it to be over with. While the shower warmed up, she looked herself over in the mirror. She could hardly believe she was already 18...But it was showing. Her long red hair fell messily down her shoulders, showing off her petite body. Her deep blue eyes had dark rings around them. She was told that she looked a lot like her mother when she was younger...except tiny.

Once she had finished Marissa made her way downstairs. She had installed an escalator on the side of the stairs for mobility. Entering the living room, her mother and older sister, Margot, shot confetti shooters as she turned the corner.

"Happy Birthday!" they said in unison. Despite her stamina being drained, it made her happy to see smiles on their faces. After getting scooped up and placed on the table, they suddenly turned serious.

"Marissa, I know this is short notice but for your surprise we need to go for a ride in the car. You see, the surprise is...me and someone else's mother made an arrangement. She has a tiny child too...but can't afford to take care of her. Meanwhile, you've been working for years to pull your own weight around the house. But it clearly takes a toll on you. You're always stressed or tired, and I believe that you need something to pull you away from work. So today, you're going to meet your...well...your fiance..." she drifted off.

Marissa had calmly listened the entire time, but kept her head down.

"So...you're going to give me away?" she said, tears coming down her eyes. "I make you worry, so you want to marry me off to a complete stranger?!"

"NO! I'm this FOR you, not TO you! While I did make this without your permission, you don't need to go through with it. We planned the wedding for today, but you get to meet your spouse first. If you don't approve, I'll call the whole thing off!"

She started to go over everything in her head. All in all, Karen was just worried about her. Plus, what did she have to lose by marriage? It wasn't like dating was easy for someone like her. The only reasons she could think of to object was wanting to stay with her family...and it couldn't be a man. She had never come out as a lesbian, but since her mother had gone through all the hassle she should at least meet the guy.

Marissa was silent. With no response given, Karen and Margot picked her up and got in their car. Once they were halfway there, Marissa spoke up.

"Who is it?" Karen was stunned at first, but quickly recovered and smiled.

"We put the file on your phone, dear. I know you like to know everything before making a decision, so everything about her is inside the file."

"Her?"

"Yeah...you really shouldn't doubt a mother's intuition" she said with a wink. Marissa blushed, her mother knew before she could even come out of the closet.

Who is in the file?

A) Allison Gregger
Age:25
Occupation: Unemployed
Height: 5 inches
Description: A thick blonde woman with green eyes and a need to be taken care of. She wasn't quite fat, but she had a good bit of pudge on her. Her demands for the marriage was that she would never be required to work. Her mother can't afford to give in to her needy nature. She wants to live out her life in lazy luxury and agreed to the marriage after only seeing a few pictures and an estimate of her income. Being married to her would require a lot of giving with receiving little in return.

B) Maria Summers
Age: 21
Occupation: Personal Trainer
Height: 6 inches
Description: A dominating brunette with brown eyes. Despite being tiny, she's very health focused and therefore very slim and toned. She works by demonstrating proper workouts on video. A huge flirt and a romantic at heart, most days would be filled with"fun" times. Her mother just kicked her out because tinies freak out her new husband. The only thing written on why she agreed is that she wanted someone to "be on bottom." Marrying her would mean taking a lot of teasing and attention.

C) Clara Nelson
Age: 19
Occupation: Student
Height: 3 inches
Description: A thin blonde girl with blue eyes, she just recently graduated from high school and is taking online college courses. She's very shy and timid, she can hardly speak up around strangers. It's incredibly easy to compare her to a mouse with her skittish nature and messy appearance. She's actually still deciding on whether or not to agree to the marriage. Her mother loves her, but is also very strict. Clara had turned 19 about a month ago, which was the deadline her mother had set for her to move out. Marrying her would mean being the forward one and helping her study.
1321.title: Possibilities

info.brief_description: A man or woman born tiny, is now being married off by their family. Many possible spouses.
info.description:
This story is about either a man or woman, between the age of 18-22 and who was born 3-6 inches tall(you choose). For some reason they are more durable than what someone that small should be, but they aren't invincible and can still feel pain. They have been tiny all their life and their family has taken care of them. Now that they are 18 and considered an adult, their parents feel it's time they left the nest, so to speak. They no longer have the time or patience to take care of them like they had been. So, they are going to find someone for them to marry and they can be their problem. Being so small, their family will do the talking for them at the ceremony, so they won't have any option to turn her/him down.

Rules/Guidelines
1. Don't shrink the main character any further, they should stay at their original shrunken height.
2. Don't kill the main character.
3. Mouth play is allowed, but please no vore, because that would be killing.
4. Try to avoid 1 sentence chapters.
5. Most everything else is allowed.
6. Have Fun!


}}>>UPDATE 9/9/18: This story has been mostly inactive recently, but I am hoping people are still interested. As a bit of an extra incentive to get people adding, I'm now offering GP for all new chapters. I hope you all enjoy the story, and I would love to see people come back. If you have any questions or suggestions, please let me know.<{{
